full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### TENDER ID: WS4053103166

### Request for Standing Offer for Bus Rental Services
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting interested suppliers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for chartered bus services with driver. The services will be offered for the following regions:

*   National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Quebec (except NCR)
### Service Requirements

The RFSO aims to acquire chartered bus services with drivers for the transportation of passengers. The services will be required for a period of 24 months, from the date of contract award.

### Key Details

*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-27T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-07-21
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Name: Alina Cocieru (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   Email: alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    *   Phone: Not available
    *   Fax: Not available

### Notices
For more information regarding this RFSO, please refer to the official solicitation on the Ariba Discovery website:
*   https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17556347?extsite=MTc1NTYzNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: this official solicitation includes a detailed description of the terms and conditions of the contract, as well as any additional requirements or specifications. Suppliers are encouraged to review this document carefully before submitting their proposal.
